charges.charge_description: Ct. 1: Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 5 kilograms, gross weight, of cocaine; 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A) Offense date: 4/26/04; penalty: Not less than 10 yrs nor more than Life and/or $400,000 fine plus 5 yr SRT-as to each count. (1)

Ct. 2: Possession with intent to distribute more than 5 kilograms, that is, approx. 27.95 kilograms (61.49 lbs) gross weight, of cocaine; 21 USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A) and 18 USC 2. Offense date: 4/26/04; penalty: Not less than 10 yrs nor more than Life and/or $400,000 fine plus 5 yr SRT as to each count. (2)

Ct. 3: Conspiracy to import more than 5 kilograms, gross weight, of cocaine; 21 USC 963, 952(a) and 960(b)(1) Offense date: 4/26/04; penalty: Not less than 10 yrs nor more than Life and/or $400,000 fine plus 5 yr SRT as to each count. (3)

Ct. 4: Importation of more than 5 kilograms, that is, approx. 27.95 kilograms (61.49 lbs) gross weight of cocaine; offense date: 4/26/04; penalty: Not less than 10 yrs nor more than Life and/or $400,000 fine plus 5 yrs SRT as to each count. (4)
Possession with Intent to Distribute 27.95 kilograms of Cocaine; Conspiracy to Distribute 27.95 kilograms of Cocaine; 21 USC 841 and 21 USC 846 [1:04-m-1396]
